result.name: north-east-nephrops-2004-05-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
To describe the composition of the *Nephrops* population in the vicinity of 
Cefas underwater camera survey stations, and to describe the variability of 
commercial catch rates of *Nephrops* and by-catch species according to 
location, vessel and time.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
